basic-info.university: Federal University of Rio de Janeiro — UFRJ — Brazil

ta-graphs.title:
Teaching Assistant in
Graph Theory
ta-graphs.text: Besides having had the opportunity to offer assistance in person as well as remotely, I oriented students on how to perform their practical assignments and graded their work.

research-graphs.title: Undergraduate Research in Algorithms and Graphs
research-graphs.text: I've been part of two distinct theoretical projects involving graph algorithms, combinatorial optimization and distributed systems, resulting in a scientific paper submitted in November 2018.

research-big-data.title: Undergraduate Research in Big Data and Mach. Learning
research-big-data.text: Project in collaboration with the ATLAS Experiment (CERN, Switzerland). Our goal is to implement algorithms to identify similar data and diminish the training cycle of the neural networks in operation at ATLAS while preserving performance.

ta-algorithms.title: Teaching Assistant in Algorithms and Data Struct.
ta-algorithms.text: I had the pleasure to deliver lectures, elaborate exercises and propose practical assignments, as well as assisting and getting to know the individualities of each student. It was my best experience in college.

my-papers.title: Research
my-papers.ctic-info: Top 10 Best undergraduate research paper in CTIC 2019 (Brazilian nationwide competition)

first.title: Issues Monitoring
first.text: System built with Software Engineering techniques as a team to monitor activities of university labs at UFRJ. It features Arduinos, a web interface, a server and a parser for integration with a proprietary system.

second.title: Social Compassion
second.text: An interactive web-based visualization collecting data from 222,180 tweets displaying user reactions to the civil war in Syria. This personal project was inspired by an art exhibition exploring data visualization that took place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

third.title: LibrasOffice & Others
third.text: I've helped develop a website and a video for LibrasOffice, which adds support for Brazilian Sign Language (Libras) to OpenOffice Calc. At the moment, I'm also involved in the creation of software for the Deaf using computer vision techniques.

first.title: 1st Place Computer Engineering UFRJ
first.description: Ranked 1st in the entrance exam with a total of 4035.60 points through ENEM 2014.

second.title: 1000 Points in Writing section of ENEM 2014
second.description: Writer of one of the 250 essays, out of a total of 6 million, who achieved 1000 points in ENEM 2014 (top 0.004%).

third.title: 115/120 in TOEFL iBT (98th percentile)
third.description: 30/30 in Reading section, 30/30 in Listening, 26/30 in Speaking and 29/30 in Writing, adding up to a total of 115/120 points (October 2018).
